thread.section_title: Town Fair Tire Centers, Inc Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Town Fair Tire Centers, Inc | www.townfairtire.com
thread.title: Bob F
thread.title_full: Town Fair Tire Centers, Inc reviewed by Bob F

author: Bob F
title: Bob F
text: Made online reservation. Arrived 5 minutes early, was greeted and served immediately. Inspected my tires, recommended balancing as well as alignment. I went next door to do some shopping. Received text messages indicating the work had started; and later that is was completed. Answered all my questions and everyone on staff was extremely courteous and professional. Excellent experience!
